message.body: Netflix shares rise as it appears Apple's original content won't be a serious threat to streamer $NFLX $AAPL https://cnb.cx/2NDnxZ6

links.title: Netflix shares rise as it appears Apple's original content won't be a serious threat to streamer
links.description: Albert Llop | Anadolu Agency | Getty Images Netflix shares climbed more than 2 percent on Monday after a report said Apple is veering toward more family friendly content for its video-streaming service. The Wall Street Journal reported that Apple wants high-quality shows with broad appeal that does not include gratuitous sex, violence or profanity.
